评论详情: Warm and cozy, very comfy for an xs!

It arrived in good condition. The material didn't feel great,  and as an extremely oversized sweater,  felt like the entire thing was just being pulled down by the weight on the knit. Very poorly fitted. More of a dress than a sweater.
This sweater is well made and just like the picture. It is warm and feels nice.

The sweater is acrylic/wool so it is a bit itchy. Well cared for but you can definitely tell it’s used. The width and sleeves fit nicely, but it is a VERY long sweater. I ordered a medium and I’m 5’4”. The front came down a couple of inches above my knees and to the bend of the knee at the back. If I were taller I would keep it.
